content: make the perfect warm weather layering accessory the makin it count cape is fun flowy and beginner friendly this darling cape will be the accessory that makes the outfit this pattern is one size fits most but includes instructions for making it larger or smaller the sample in the photos is 11 5 long i used 1 skein of sullivan fingering from bede sisters in the color peacock this is a great project for those one-off hand dyed skeins pattern is available for free on my blog https //crochetaweigh com/free-crochet-pattern-makin-it-count-cape/
